ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 15:31:20. [CVDB146988] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:48:28. [Issue ID 250366]
ComicInfo.Title: Character Bumps; Impressing the Opposite Sex; Secrets of Crashing Highbrow Society; New Uses for Comics; Modern Kiddie Books; Harry Canopener and Candy Bar's Top Model Agency; Illustrated Proverbs; TV Programs of the Future; Exclusive Pictures from Darkest Africa; Cracked Rogue's Gallery; The Barbeque; 'Enry 'Iggins of Scotland Yard; Modern Day Monsters; The Joker's Wild; Have Gun Won't Travel; Foreign Car Conscious; Mureyene
ComicInfo.Summary:
Other uses for comic books in society besides reading them.
A British detective film requires subtitles for American audiences due to the excessive accents and slang.
Prehistoric monsters and their contemporary counterparts.
Police drag a man to the station so they can play cards with him.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Maneely,Carl Burgos,Syd Shores,Bill Ward,Bernard Baily,Al Jaffee,Bill Elder,John Severin,Bill Everett
ComicInfo.Inker: Joe Maneely,Bill Ward,Al Jaffee,Bill Elder,John Severin
